si.title: ඔබ උපත ලැබුවේ 2007 දීද?
body_lines: 2007.01.31 දිනට පෙර උපත ලැබූ පුරවැසියන්ගේ නම් වහාම විමසන ලෙස මැතිවරණ කොමිෂන් සභාව ගමේ නිලධාරීන්ට උපදෙස් දී තිබේ.

en.title: Did you born in 2007?
body_lines: The Elections Commission has instructed the village officials to immediately inquire about the names of the citizens born before 31.01.2007.

summary_lines: The Elections Commission asks village officials to identify citizens born before January 31, 2007.
